text: Michael Vincent Lawler (born September 9, 1986) is an American politician. He has been the U.S. representative for New York's 17th congressional district since 2023. From 2021 to 2022, he was a Republican member of the New York State Assembly. Lawler was born to Marie (n√©e Fortino) and Kevin Lawler on September 9, 1986, and raised in South Salem, New York, and Suffern, New York. Lawler is Catholic. ==References== ==Other websites== * Michael Lawler (New York) - Ballotpedia * Topic: Mike Lawler - The New York Times * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
